pkgmetadata.longdescription:
This ENIGMA package is both the backend and engine to the LateralGM frontend GUI. ENIGMA is a developer environment/toolchain used to compile Game Maker games, GML (Game Maker Language) scripts, and EDL (Enigma Development Language) scripts that have syntax between GML and C++.
The ENIGMA engine is the API and the game state mangement offerings and management.
You need to add the following in /etc/portage/profile/package.use.force in order to use experimental support. ----- CUT BELOW HERE ----- games-misc/enigma -android games-misc/enigma -wine ----- CUT ABOVE HERE -----
